overview: A team of crooks seek refuge in a safe house for 24 hours, but is their biggest threat within? Shane is the getaway driver for a big hit on a Liverpool bank, who turns on the mob who hired him, and assembles his own team to help rob the bank robbers. They hide out on The Isle of Man awaiting their new identities. There truly is No Honor Amongst Thieves..!
tagline: Is There No Honor Amongst Thieves?
title: Longtails
